level.heading: APPLICATION OF REASONABLE ACCOMMODATION POLICY (ยง 14-7401)

level.text: This chapter applies to individuals with disabilities in the following programs provided by the DCHA:
Applicants of all Housing Choice Voucher and Moderate Rehabilitation Programs;
Participants of the Housing Choice Voucher and Moderate Rehabilitation Programs; and

Participants in all other programs or activities receiving Federal financial assistance that are conducted or sponsored by the DCHA, its agents or contractors including all non-housing facilities and common areas owned or operated by the DCHA.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 2468, 2469 (March 15, 2002).
